##CLASSES CRS.CurrikiReviewStatusClass_status_100=Not Rated/Not Rateable CRS.CurrikiReviewStatusClass_status_300=Part of a Basic Resource CRS.CurrikiReviewStatusClass_status_400=Basic CRS.CurrikiReviewStatusClass_status_500=Part of a Good Resource CRS.CurrikiReviewStatusClass_status_600=Good CRS.CurrikiReviewStatusClass_status_700=Part of an Exemplary Resource CRS.CurrikiReviewStatusClass_status_800=Exemplary CRS.CurrikiReviewStatusClass_status_200=Partner CRS.CurrikiReviewStatusClass_status_0=Not Rated/Not Rateable CRS.CurrikiReviewStatusClass_status_1=Basic CRS.CurrikiReviewStatusClass_status_2=Good CRS.CurrikiReviewStatusClass_status_3=Exemplary CRS.CurrikiReviewClass_technicalcompletness_0=Not Rated/Not Rateable CRS.CurrikiReviewClass_technicalcompletness_1=Basic CRS.CurrikiReviewClass_technicalcompletness_2=Good CRS.CurrikiReviewClass_technicalcompletness_3=Exemplary CRS.CurrikiReviewClass_contentaccuracy_0=Not Rated/Not Rateable CRS.CurrikiReviewClass_contentaccuracy_1=Basic CRS.CurrikiReviewClass_contentaccuracy_2=Good CRS.CurrikiReviewClass_contentaccuracy_3=Exemplary CRS.CurrikiReviewClass_appropriatepedagogy_0=Not Rated/Not Rateable CRS.CurrikiReviewClass_appropriatepedagogy_1=Basic CRS.CurrikiReviewClass_appropriatepedagogy_2=Good CRS.CurrikiReviewClass_appropriatepedagogy_3=Exemplary CRS.CurrikiReviewClass_rating_0=Not Rated/Not Rateable CRS.CurrikiReviewClass_rating_1=Basic CRS.CurrikiReviewClass_rating_2=Good CRS.CurrikiReviewClass_rating_3=Exemplary curriki.crs.review.CRSJumpPage.url=/xwiki/bin/view/Main/AboutCurrikiReviewSystem ##NOMINATE DIALOG moved from GWT on 01-29-09 curriki.crs.nominate=Nominate curriki.crs.nominate.nominatefollowingresourceforreview=You are nominating the following resource for review: curriki.crs.nominate.comments=Enter optional comments: curriki.crs.nominate.cannotnominatewithoutcomment=Please add a comment for your nomination. curriki.crs.nominate.commentstext=Write a note to the Curriki Review System reviewers. For example, what should a reviewer pay particular attention to? If you are nominating a reviewed resource, how has the resource changed since its last review? curriki.crs.nominate.commentsfootertext=Your nomination will not be complete until you click Submit. curriki.crs.nominate.submit=Submit curriki.crs.nominate.cancel=Cancel params.crs.nominateurl=/xwiki/bin/view/CRS/Nominate params.crs.reviewurl=/xwiki/bin/view/CRS/Review ##AUTOMATED NOMINATION NOTE IF HIGHLY RATED BY MEMBER curriki.crs.nominate.automatic_due_to_rating.note=Automatically nominated because highly rated by member ##THANK YOU FOR NOMINATING curriki.crs.nominate_thankyou=Thank you for nominating this resource for rating by the Curriki Review System.

The resource has been added to the queue and will be assessed by Curriki's expert reviewers based on criteria for the relevant Instructional Component Type.

Return to the nominated resource. curriki.crs.nominate_thankyoufromgwt=Thank you for your nomination. Close this window. curriki.crs.nominate_alreadynominated=This resource is already nominated. curriki.crs.review.reviewthisresource=REVIEW THIS RESOURCE curriki.crs.review.incomplete=This review is incomplete. Please complete all fields. curriki.crs.review.submittedby=Submitted by curriki.crs.review.currentrating=Current Rating curriki.crs.review.lastreviewed=Last Reviewed curriki.crs.review.on=on curriki.crs.review.setict=Set ICT curriki.crs.review.nominatorsnotes=Nominator's Notes curriki.crs.review.tc=Technical Completeness curriki.crs.review.ca=Content Accuracy curriki.crs.review.ap=Appropriate Pedagogy curriki.crs.review.comments=Review Text curriki.crs.review.commentsdetails=The first sentence of your review text will be automatically generated based on the scores you have selected above. Please write a few sentences explaining your choices. You will preview the full text and then submit it. Review text cannot exceed {0} characters. curriki.crs.review.comments.maxlengthexceeded=Review text cannot exceed {0} characters. curriki.crs.review.notValidNotRatedCategorySelection=You can only apply N/R in the "Appropriate Pedagogy" category, or in all categories. curriki.crs.review.mustSelectAValueInAllCategories=You must select a rating in all categories. curriki.crs.review.submitpreview=Preview curriki.crs.review.submitreview=Submit Review curriki.crs.review.revise=Revise curriki.crs.review.saved=Your review has been posted. curriki.crs.review.returnto=Return to the curriki.crs.review.document=reviewed resource curriki.crs.review.or=or curriki.crs.review.reviewpage=the review queue curriki.crs.review.preview=Preview
The text below will be posted on the resource's Comments tab. You may submit this review as it currently stands or return to the Review form to revise it. curriki.crs.review.mailsentto=Notification email sent to curriki.crs.reviews.reviewertools=Review Queue: curriki.crs.review.unnominate=This resource cannot or should not be reviewed at this time. curriki.crs.review.unnominateconfirm=If you wish to remove this resource from the Review Queue and make it appear as if had not been nominated, with status "Unrated/Unrateable" and a History revision note "Resource un-nominated," click OK. curriki.crs.review.form.dialog.confirm_header=CONFIRM ACTION curriki.crs.review.partnerconfirmtitle=MAKE THIS A PARTNER RESOURCE curriki.crs.review.partnerconfirmmessage=If you want to set this to Partner, click OK. curriki.crs.review.partner=This is a Partner resource. ##History keys and strings are in GLOBAL CLASS ##ASTERIX RATING curriki.crs.review.isChild=This resource is a child of a reviewed parent. curriki.crs.review.setas*=Select a value... ##Note these values are also used GWT in the History of the Resource. curriki.crs.review.setas300=1* curriki.crs.review.setas500=2* curriki.crs.review.setas700=3* curriki.crs.review.setas200=P click OK. curriki.crs.review.asterixReview.removedConfirm_700=To remove the CRS score of 3* from this resource, click OK. curriki.crs.review.asterixReview.removedConfirm_500=To remove the CRS score of 2* from this resource, click OK. curriki.crs.review.asterixReview.removedConfirm_300=To remove the CRS score of 1* from this resource, click OK. ## use in GWT and in Wiki curriki.crs.reviewlist.currikihaspartnered=This resource shows a P because it was contributed by a Curriki partner. Curriki works with partner organizations to share curriculum resources with the global education community. curriki.crs.reviewlist.nocurrikireviews=This resource has not been reviewed. curriki.crs.generatedcomment=This resource was reviewed using the rubric for {0} and received an overall CRS rating of {1}

Its component ratings were:
